title: Stake
info: Stakes serve as ammunition for the Stake Launcher. They can be purchased from the Arms Dealer or the Witch Doctor for 15 each when the player has the Stake Launcher in their inventory. Both the Stake Launcher and Stakes are dropped by Mourning Wood during the Pumpkin Moon event. Stakes gain an extraordinary damage boost against Vampires.
